identifier: An encoding provides information how to decode a code string, i.e. how to split its tokens and map its keys to its values.

definition_en: Information to decode the meaning of a code that is given in a string.
Character range for the complete encoding string.
Substring of an encoded string that contains information.
Token that maps directly to individuals of a class.
The order of the tokens in the identifier.
Token length is fixed and not variable.
A dictionary maps a key to a value.
Token that maps directly to a mapping table called token dictionary.
